none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on February 03, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
A perfect and fierce collision of US street punk and downbeat heavy UK82. Sweaty, fist pounding, addictive pogo from Milwaukee with vocals somewhere between MIDNITE BRAIN and VIOLATORS, Doomsday... hit the streets last year and has gotten frequent spins since I caught them last summer. Let LAW/LESS sink in, and that rudimentary hook that makes up "Victims" will become a timeless mental classic.  DOOMSDAY...
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GAk9c-0Kjv4/XjgvSAbq03I/AAAAAAAAWiM/x5QNnFlmlA4EUkv9-lAcij36mNvelalfgCEwYBhgL/s1600/LawLess%2Bimg2.jpg

seo.title: Law/Less - Doomsday - Terminal Escape
